talent_kitsu_mirror_nerve_rules-u: Once per session, after witnessing an enemy action (Slicing, Unarmed Combat, or a spell), spend 2 Strain to mimic part of it. Gain a bonus die on your next roll using the same skill or spell school.
talent_kitsu_one_breath_casting_rules-u: Once per session, cast a non-damaging Illusion, Alteration, or Enchantment spell as a free action. Optional: Spend 1 Strain to reroll the casting with a bonus die if the first attempt fails.
talent_kitsu_phase_residue_rules-u: Once per scene, leave a short-lived after-image at the edge of cover; attackers suffer a penalty die to hit you until you move from that position. Optional: Spend 2 Strain to force one attacker to reroll with a penalty die.
talent_kitsu_shadow_map_rules-u: Once per session, instantly sketch a mental map of nearby cover, exits, and vantage points. Gain a bonus die on Navigate and Perception to exploit it for the scene. Optional: Spend 1 Strain to grant an ally a bonus die on Navigate using the same map.
talent_kitsu_slipframe_trigger_rules-u: Once per scene, when reduced to 0 HP, remain conscious until end of your next turn. Optional: Spend 2 Strain to also stand up or move one zone as part of this effect.
talent_kitsu_mask_of_the_hunt_rules-u: Once per session, choose a quarry; gain a bonus die on Perception and Stealth checks made to pursue or ambush that target for 1 scene. Optional: Spend 2 Strain to apply a penalty die to the quarry’s next Perception check to detect you.
talent_kitsu_nine_lives_protocol_rules-u: Once per session, avoid a fatal blow; set HP to 1 instead of falling to 0 or below. Optional: Spend 2 Strain to also immediately move one zone or make a free Dodge.
talent_kitsu_rewired_pulse_rules-u: Once per scene, on using Slicing or a technomancy effect, cause a harmless sensor flare that confuses targeting for 1 round; attackers suffer a penalty die to hit you. Optional: Spend 2 Strain to extend the penalty to an ally within short range.
talent_kitsu_tailwind_gambit_rules-u: Once per session, after moving at least two zones, gain a bonus die on your next attack or Slicing roll this round. Optional: Spend 1 Strain to also gain a bonus die on Dodge until your next turn.
talent_lyranni_aether_override_rules-u: Once per session, before you roll Slicing, Electronics, or Mechanics , you may invoke an override surge: roll with a bonus die and ignore one penalty die from environmental interference or counter-intrusion.
talent_lyranni_echo_in_the_veins_rules-u: Choose one: gain +10% to Performance (any), Insight, or Streetwise. Reflects the lyrical awareness and social perception of the Lyranni.
talent_lyranni_glimmerstep_rules-u: Once per scene, spend 1 Strain to blur your magical footprint. Gain a bonus die on your next Stealth or Arcana roll to avoid detection by magical, spiritual, or surveillance effects.
talent_lyranni_legacy_spark_rules-u: Once per session, reroll a failed Arcana, Occult Lore, or Etiquette (Lyranni) check.
talent_lyranni_resonant_poise_rules-u: Once per session, when dealing with those who recognize your Veilmark or lineage, gain a bonus die to Etiquette (High Society or Lyranni) or Charm for the rest of the scene.
talent_lyranni_social_ghost_rules-u: Use Charm in place of Persuade or Intimidate when relying on elegance, mystique, or cultural presence.
talent_lyranni_threadwalker_rules-u: Gain a bonus die to Arcana, Spirit Lore, or Occult Lore (choose one) when interacting with Veil phenomena. May be taken multiple times, once per skill.
talent_lyranni_veil_blooded_sense_rules-: Once per session, detect the nearest major source of Veil activity (spirit, ward, corruption, or echo). Gain a bonus die on your next Arcana or Spirit Lore roll to investigate.
talent_lyranni_veilsight_rules-u: Activate as an action to perceive spirits, magical echoes, and arcane disturbances layered in the Veil. While active, gain a bonus die to Arcana or Spirit Lore to analyze anomalies. Spend 1 strain for 1 round or spend 4 strain to maintain for the entire scene.
talent_lyranni_ancestral_resonance_rules: Once per session, when dealing with ancestral spirits, relics, or Lyranni rites , gain a bonus die to Arcana, Occult Lore, or Spirit Lore and, on success, ask the GM one clarifying question about the item/rite’s intent or memory.
talent_lyranni_illuminated_touch_rules-u: Once per session, spend 1 Strain to read spiritual residue or arcane emotion imprinted on a location or item. Gain a bonus die to Insight or Spirit Lore, and on success receive one concrete sensory impression (image, phrase, or feeling) from the imprint.
talent_lyranni_memory_bound_echo_rules-u: Once per session, choose Arcana, Occult Lore, or Spirit Lore and gain a bonus die on all checks with that skill for the remainder of the scene.
talent_lyranni_rite_bound_rules-u: Once per session, attempt to banish a spirit using any trained Magic skill. You must flavor the action through a Lyranni rite or ancestral tradition.
talent_lyranni_spirit_favored_rules-u: Once per session, for one scene in which you primarily interact with spirits or Veil-bound entities, roll Charm, Persuade, or Insight with a bonus die.
talent_lyranni_veil_dancer_rules-u: Once per session, gain a bonus die to Deception, Stealth, or Performance (any).
talent_lyranni_veilsplice_rules-u: Once per session, before a Slicing/Electronics roll, declare a veilsplice: treat non-sapient Veil interference as neutral (no penalty dice) and roll with a bonus die.
talent_lyranni_whispers_beyond_rules-u: Once per session, commune with a minor spirit or residual echo to receive a cryptic insight or spiritual impression.
talent_lyranni_words_like_silk_rules-u: Once per session, declare one social statement to be treated as credible by neutral NPCs unless given a strong reason to doubt. Gain a bonus die to Charm or Persuade during that interaction.
talent_lyranni_blood_rite_channeling_rul: Once per session, when below half Strain , cast one spell with a bonus die ; its Strain die increases by one step (e.g., 1d6 → 1d8). Does not stack with other strain-mod effects.
talent_lyranni_echo_binding_rules-u: Once per session, bind a minor cooperative spirit. It aids for the scene, granting a bonus die to Perception, Arcana, or one Magic skill (chosen on binding).
talent_lyranni_lyranni_discipline_rules-: Once per session, when above half Strain , cast one spell and reduce its Strain die by one step. May not be used with Blood Rite Channeling on the same cast.
talent_lyranni_shadow_echo_step_rules-u: Once per scene, after evading a spell or attack, move up to one range band up to long range as if phasing through shadow. Gain a bonus die to Dodge or Stealth.
talent_lyranni_subtle_authority_rules-u: Once per session, gain a bonus die to Charm, Performance, or Etiquette (High Society) during a formal or elite social exchange.
talent_lyranni_true_veilsight_rules-u: Veilsight may now be activated reflexively as a free action. While active, gain a bonus die to Arcana or Spirit Lore when studying arcane/spiritual effects. Spend 1 strain for 1 round or spend 4 strain to maintain for the entire scene.
talent_lyranni_veil_laced_command_rules-: Once per scene, spend 1 Strain when issuing a direct command in a formal or ritual setting. Gain a bonus die to Persuade or Intimidate, as long as you invoke Veilborn status or tradition.
talent_lyranni_breath_of_the_veil_rules-: Once per session, spend 3 Strain to enter a state of deep arcane attunement. For the rest of the scene, gain a bonus die to Arcana, Spirit Lore, and Magic (Illusion or Enchantment) . If used in a formal ritual, the result is considered exceptional (GM discretion).
talent_lyranni_echo_of_elegance_rules-u: Once per session, ignore one penalty die on a social roll and gain a bonus die instead. You may also automatically succeed on one opposed Charm or Performance contest against a neutral or friendly target.
talent_lyranni_veil_linked_will_rules-u: Once per session, cast a spell with a bonus die, and reduce its Strain die by one step, regardless of your current Strain level.
talent_lyranni_voice_of_the_ancestors_ru: Once per session, gain a bonus die on any social skill roll or spell targeting spirits or Veil entities. You also roll with a bonus die when banishing a hostile spirit.
talent_veyra_cache_sense_rules-u: You’ve developed an instinct for spotting what others discard. Gain a bonus die to Survival (Urban) or Mechanics when scavenging parts from damaged infrastructure, machinery, or field wreckage. Once per session, you may improvise a basic repair using overlooked scrap or broken components, as long as they’re accessible in the scene.
talent_veyra_circuit_whispers_rules-u: Broken systems still speak—you just know how to listen. Gain a bonus die on your first Mechanics or Electronics roll when examining a damaged non-magical device. This applies even without schematics or tools.
talent_veyra_echo_sense_rules-u: Your ears read space like others read light. You may roll Listen in place of Perception in darkness or low visibility, and gain a bonus die to detect hidden movement or unseen threats.
talent_veyra_mask_the_signal_rules-u: Once per scene, after a failed Slicing or Electronics check, you may reroll with a penalty die. If you succeed on the reroll, you remove any trace lock the system has on you.
talent_veyra_no_footprints_rules-u: You learned to move like silence itself. You suffer no movement penalty when using Stealth, and may move at full speed without increasing your chances of detection.
talent_veyra_patchwork_fixer_rules-u: You’re a master of salvage repair. Gain a +10% bonus to Mechanics and Electronics when working with scrap or improvised tools. Repairs last one scene or until significantly stressed.
talent_veyra_reflex_map_rules-u: You carry a mental map of tunnels and hidden routes. Gain a bonus die to Navigate checks in urban environments and may reroll one failed Navigate or Stealth test per scene.
talent_veyra_signal_ghost_rules-u: You slip through digital doors like breath. Once per session, reroll a failed Slicing or Security Systems check. If the reroll succeeds, no trace of the intrusion remains unless the system was protected by active countermeasures.
talent_veyra_slip_between_rules-u: You move through collapsed ducts and half-formed crawlways like you were born to. You ignore movement penalties from tight spaces and gain a bonus die to Stealth rolls made while entering, exiting, or navigating narrow areas.
talent_veyra_battlefield_sync_rules-u: You sync your movement to your pack—and know just when to break it. When acting in formation with at least one ally within Short range, you may choose +10% to either Stealth or Dodge for the remainder of the scene.
talent_veyra_echo_map_recall_rules-u: Once per scene, after spending one turn listening and mapping an area, you may ask the GM one question about the layout, hidden passages, or likely guard routes—you receive a truthful short answer.
talent_veyra_nocturne_optimizer_rules-u: In low light or darkness, gain a bonus die to Stealth and +10% to Perception (hearing).
talent_veyra_overclock_instinct_rules-u: Once per scene, when attempting a quick fix with Mechanics or Electronics under time pressure, you may roll with a bonus die. On a fumble, the device fails catastrophically at GM discretion.
talent_veyra_ping_and_pull_rules-u: Once per scene, after a successful Slicing or Electronics check, you may cause a nearby unsecured door, drawer, or similar device within Short range to open or misfire, creating a distraction.
talent_veyra_salvage_sense_rules-u: Gain a bonus die to Perception or Mechanics when searching for usable scrap in urban or industrial ruins. Once per scene, you may find a component worth up to 50 credits usable for a repair.
talent_veyra_silent_cascade_rules-u: Once per scene, after succeeding on a Stealth roll, you may move an additional Short distance without increasing your chances of detection.
talent_veyra_vent_ghost_rules-u: You learned to slip the coolant drafts and breathing grids like a ghost. Gain a bonus die to Stealth checks made in ventilation systems, maintenance shafts, or similar infrastructure.
talent_veyra_zero_trace_protocol_rules-u: When slicing or using electronics, you may spend 1 Strain to reduce any trace lock progress against you by one step.
talent_veyra_cachejack_protocol_rules-u: Once per session, as an action you may make a field repair to a drone, bot, or vehicle without tools or prep, using available scrap or failed components others would overlook. In addition, you may now repair two separate machines in the same scene using only repurposed materials—no standard parts required.
talent_veyra_dark_grid_savant_rules-u: While in low-light or darkness, you gain a bonus die to Stealth rolls for the remainder of the scene. If unseen at the start of a round, you may take a free maneuver.
talent_veyra_echo_splice_reflex_rules-u: Once per session, when you successfully use Reflex Map to reroll a failed Navigate or Stealth test, you also gain a bonus die to your next roll this scene.
talent_veyra_echowire_scramble_rules-u: Once per session, after succeeding on a Electronics check, you may distort local signals, scrambling the targeting of bots and drones. For 1 round, those enemies within Medium range or less suffer –20% to attacks.
talent_veyra_recursive_salvager_rules-u: When using Overclock Instinct, you may now reroll the result once per scene, and ignore the first malfunction triggered by that repair or activation.
talent_veyra_signal_evasion_loop_rules-u: Once per session, after successfully using Signal Ghost to reroll a Slicing or Security Systems check, you may also suppress the next trace lock or countermeasure activation triggered against you.
talent_veyra_stealth_harmonic_rules-u: Once per scene, if you successfully use Silent Cascade, you may also grant an ally within Short range +10% to Stealth and allow them to move at full speed with you without penalty.
talent_veyra_thread_the_vents_rules-u: You no longer suffer penalties when squeezing through collapsed ducts, tight corridors, or debris-strewn zones. Once per scene, you may as a reaction reposition to any location within Short range that shares partial cover.
talent_veyra_circuit_sovereign_rules-u: You are one with damaged infrastructure. Once per session, you may declare any malfunctioning or broken device within Medium range as under your control for one round—doors open, turrets fire, signals reroute. No roll is required.
talent_veyra_ghost_in_the_gears_rules-u: You may now treat any destroyed or disabled bot, drone, or vehicle as salvageable, no matter its state. Once per session, as an action, you may restore one such machine to basic operational status (1 HP) using only makeshift parts.
talent_veyra_neurospike_blur_rules-u: Once per session, you may trigger a neural surge that phases your outline and silences your tech signature for one full round. During this time, you cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless detected by Hard difficulty Perception check or magic means.
talent_veyra_silent_dominion_rules-u: You become a whisper in motion. For one scene per session, you move at full speed without penalty to Stealth. While this is active, any passive detection (visual, electronic, or magical) must succeed at one level greater than your success to perceive you.
translation_implant-u: A reprogrammed translation implant or sentimental token from your surrogate upbringing—worn smooth from years of fidgeting.
veil_creature_token-u: A preserved Veil-creature token — fang, eye, or glyph-stone — kept in a claw-marked pouch
veil_modulator-u: A home-built veil-modulator or cloaked commset passed down from a mentor, sibling, or crew.
veil_threaded_accessory-u: A Veil-threaded accessory — a wrap or pendant bearing minor cosmetic enchantment.
veilmark_living-sigil-u: A Veilmark — a living sigil that faintly reacts to arcane or spiritual anomalies.
violence-dec: A red mist descends on the investigator and they explode in a spree of uncontrolled violence and destruction directed at their surroundings, allies or foes alike.
violence-dec2: The investigator explodes in a spree of violence and destruction. When the investigator comes to their senses, their actions may or may not be apparent or remembered. Who or what the investigator has inflicted violence upon and whether they have killed or simply inflicted harm is up to the Keeper.
wardens_apprentice_discipline_token-u: A discipline token—flat stone etched with the name of your first post.
